div.head: Curia gilde
div.p:
Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene quarto
die mensis octobris Anno Dominj Millesimo Quingentesimo Quarto

div.head: Consilium
div.p:
Alexander menyheis
sere Johne ruthirfurd
Robert blinseile
Dauid menyeis
Johnne of cullane
Alexander chamer
Alexander Reid
gilbert menyheis
Alexander mar
Androu Cullane
Johnne collisone
Johne Wormet
James collisone
Johnne of mar
Johnne of Ratre
Androw murray
Alexander gray
Dauid mar
Robert crag
Willeame futhes
patrik Reid
Duncan Collisone
Williame Wormet
Richert Waus
Mathou branche

div.head: Decanj gilde
div.p:
Eodem die Jacobus Colisone
et Johannes Retre electi fuerunt
decanj gilde pro anno Instanti prestitis
Solitis Juramentis

div.head: Magistrj fabrice ecclesie
div.p:
Eodem die Alexander menyheis et Alexander gray electj fuerunt
magistrj operis fabrice ecclesie pro Anno Instanti prestitis solitis Juramentis

div.head: Liniatores
div.p:
Alexander menyheis
Robertus blinseil
Dauid menyheis
Johannes Cullane
Alexander Rede
sere Jonhne' ruthirfurde
gilbertus Menyheis
Johannes mar
Jacobus Collisone
Johannes Ratre
Alexander gray
Robert crag
Williame futhes
Johne Wormet

Auditores compotoes alexander menyeis prepositi gilbertj
menyeis et Andree cullan decanorum gilde annj elapsi

Johannes lesly prepositus Robertus blinseile Johannes Cullane Alexander
Red Jacobus Collisone

div.head: Gustatores seruicie Appreciatores carnium
div.p:
matheus branche
georgius bisset
Willelmus murray
Willelmus nicholsone
Jacobus kennerty
Dauid fynne
Andreas body
Willelmus lard
Alexander burnat
Johannes meldrum
Thomas Riddaile
Dauid tailyeour
Dauid broys'

div.head: Gustatores seruicie
div.p:
Evin quarter
Normond lesly sergeand
philp Clerk
Johnne Colly
Crukit quarter
Androw nachtj sergeand
Androw low skynner
Alexander brabnar hatmakar
Grene quarter
gilbert prestone sergeand
gilbert paule
Johne frostar
ffuty quarter
Willeame scrimgeour sergeand
gilbert Tulideff
Alexander stablar

The said It was deliuerit be certane Arbitouris havand' the strintht of ane
assis' that Johnne andirsone burges of the said burgh sal pay tua franche crovnis tile
alexander Robertsone burgis of banff betuix this and the law day eftir youl Immediat hereftir gif
the said Johnne previs nocht nor gettis na be cursing or vthirwais betuix this
and the said tyme that he had deliuerit ane barrell of salmond tile alexander prat

The said Donald stant baxter grantit hyme awand' tile Alexander burnat
sex schillingis of money quhilkis the baillies chargit him to pay within terme of law
The saide day Johnne collisone come Souerte tile entir Johnne cuk in stanevod

Eodem die Johannes Alexander Robertsoun in banf fecit constituit creauit nominauit
et ordinauit cristoforum prat suum verum legittimum procuratorem actorem et factorem
dans et concedens eidem suam legittimam presentatem ad petendum et recipiendum
a Johannj Andersoun' duo scuta aurea le french crovnis Et
inde acquitandum agendum defendendum promittens de Rato et grato

The saide day george talyouris spous' and procurator to marione Duncanson' ayr
tile vmquhile Johne Duncanson' burges of the saide burghe askit
Certane gudis of arschip in the nayme of his saide spous' quhilkis
at katherine Cullane the Relict of vmquhile the saide Johnez
quhilkis scho denyit and he said' he suld' preiwe that scho hed'
sic gudis of airschipe Ande the balyeis assignit monunday the
vij day of the said' Instant monetht to the said' george to prewe
that scho hed sic gudis of ayrschip that the saide george or his wif
Coud' preiwe hir' possessit with pertening to the ayris of the saide
Johne Ande becaus' scho hed deliuerit al gudis of arschip forsaid
as scho allegit being in hir' possessioun' scho askit ane acquitance
according tharto

The saide day george talyour spous' and procurator to marion' Duncanson' allegit
that he was maid' quyt of the pament of the hald expensis maid'
one the laboring of ane croft quhilk Johne Duncanson' hed in tak
and tuk to prewe his said' allegeance of one monunday the vij day
of this Instant monetht of October' be alexander rede gilbert menyeis
James Colisone Androw Cullane and patry Rede befor the said balyeis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo die octobris
septembris anno quo supra

The saide day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that george talyour' hed falyeit in his preiwe anent the gudis of airschip
clamit one Katherine Cullane the relict of vmquhile Johne Duncanson'
and of the half expensis maide one the lauboring of ane Croft quhilkis
the saide Johne hede in takis and that he allegit him maid' quyt of
the said' half expensis eftir the tenor of the actis maid' tharupon' Obefor

The saide day Syme Robertsone flessour grantit him aving to Alexander prat four'
franche crovnis quhilkis the ballieis chargit him to pay within terme of law
Alsua he grantit him aving to the saide Alexander xij s' and j d' to Compt and
rekning

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' patry Rede forspekar'
that george talyour' procurator to marione Duncansone his spous' awe to pay als'
mekile money for the labouring of the croft quhilk vmquhile Johne
Duncansone hed in tak as he Intromettit with of the corne that grewe on'
the said' croft

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vndecimo die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day Johnne' balcromy grantit him awand' to Jhonne Kennertj
tua berrellis of Salmond' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay
within terme' of lawe The said' Jhonne Kennerty payand' to him viij s'
ix d' vsuale money of scotland'

The said' day the bailyeis assignit monunday cum viij dais to
Johnne balcromy to anesuer tile patry Andirsone for vj s' vj d'

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the aldirman and counsale that
ale the baxtaris within this burghe' sale haue gude and redy stuf to
serue the toune deulie as efferis Ande thai sale baik tua penny
bredis' gude and clene Stuf weile bakin contening xxviij vncez
and penny breid' contening xiiij vncez

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the aldirman and counsale that
ale the Candilmakaris within this burghe' sale mak gude candillis
smale wekit and dry the punde of maide Candill for iij d'

The saide day Johne of murray Sone and ayr tile vmquhile Androw
murray grantit and gaf to Johne leslie of warderis aldirman licence
and fre will ande fredome to mak and big ane Stabill one his
dyk of his lande betuix the land' of vmquhile thomas prat one
the Est part Ande the saide Johne aldirman grantit and fathtfullie said'
he suld' tak done the said' stabile of the said' dik quhen euere It
ples' the saide Johne of murray

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo primo die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The said' day Jhonne ramsay oblist him to Entir Johnne Jhonstoun'
within ane monetht heireftir within the tolbutht of the said' burgh
befor the balyeis to ansuer to Jhonne grig for xxij s' vj d' and' fal
yeing he Entir him nocht to pay the said' Some'

The said' day Alexander goldsmyth grantit him to pay xxxiij s' viij d'
to Richerd' frenchmen within aucht dais

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorn' assis' Alexander menyeis forspekar
that Duncan smytht aw to deliuer the masser to the ayris of vmquhile Robert
Kintor pertenyng to thame of ayrschipe And' thai fand that the said Duncan
hed done wrang in the distructioun' of ane hous' pertenyng to the saidez
ayris

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cumis to William
Wormet and William blinseill coupar to compeir befor thame for ministracioun'
of Justice anent the wrang done be the said' William blinseill to the
said' William Wormet in the done castin of the gauyle of his hous' et cetera
eftir the tenour of Our Soueran' lordis lettres direct' tharupoun'

The said' day Jhonne' balcromy lauchfully callit and' nocht comperit to
ansuer to patry Andirsoun' for vj s' vj d' of maile tharfor the balyeis
chargit gilbert prestoun' officiar to pas' and' tak ane stras' of the
said' Jhone and' lat It to borgh' gif it be askit and' warne him
to compeir one friday for the wranguis' haldin of the said' maile
as secund day of proces'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxiij die mensis Octobris anno quo supra

head.add: procuratorium Johannis ros' et sponse sue

div.p:
Eodem die Johannes ros' et Agnes vmfray Sponsa sua vnanum consensu
et assensu fecerunt constituerunt nominarunt et ordinarunt magistrum gilbertum leitht
et patricium leslie seniorem coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos et Indubitatos procuratores
actores et factores dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri Insolidum suam
liberam ac legittimam presentatem pro se et nomine suo ad petendum exigendum et reci
piendum omniam et Singulam bonam sibi agneti Jure hereditario racione decessus quondam
gilberti lethe auj suj pertinenciis a Willelmo vmfray aliisque quibuscumque Ac
firmas sibi debito de dimidietate terre Interioris occupato per dictum Willelmum
ut asseruerunt post eorum recessum de Regno scocie Ac partem suam vnius
annuj redditus quinque solidorum debito de terra anteriore eiusdem tenementi
de receptis acquitandum Cum pacto non petendum dictum Willelmum aliosque
quoscumque huiusmodi bona firmas et annuum Redditum detinens et habens prosequendum
Et similiter alia bona sibi spectans quecumque Calumpniandum agendum defendendum
Jura ostendum et cetera Ex aduersus productis et ostendens obitiendum respondendum promittens
de Rato et grato In vberiore forma procuratorij Cum Testibus clausulis
ad huiusmodi procuratorium necessariis et oportunis

The said' day the ballieis chargit Androw nachtj officiar' tile arrest
the malys of the lande quhilk William lard' Inhabitis in his handis
ay and to the tyme the dikis of the saide landis be deulie bigit quhar
throwe the nichbouris nerrast tharto be kepit fra Skatht and haue Sufficient
nychtbourschipe According to Justice

The saide day the ballieis assignit friday Cum xv dais to thomas bisset tile ansuer
to the borghe fundin one him be William blinsele for the wranguis' withhaldin
fra him of four' franche crownis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvto die mensis
octobris Anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de abirdene xxvto die mensis octobris anno Domini Millesimo
quingentesimo quarto coram honorabilibus virum Johanne leslie de Warderis preposito Thoma
leslie et thoma Waus duobus balliuorum dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem in Curia
balliuorum protribunali sedens per subscriptos videlicet Dauid menyeis alexandrum Rede
Johannem Cullane gilbertum menyeis Johannem Colison Jacobum Colisone Dauid
mar seniorem Alexandrum gray differit / patricium Rede Dauid fynne Johannem Kyntor Willelmum differit
murray Johannem moir' matheum branche Johannem falconer Johannem thomsone et Andrea
lousone burgensis dicti burgi Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Agnes mar mater arthurj
andirsone latoris presencium obiit vltra vestita et sasita ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico castrj in le chakirraw
inter terram Sancti sebastianj martiris ex occidentali et Communiones vias regias ex orientali et
boreali partibus et terram Alexandri mar' versus occidens secundum tenorem carte coram se
pro dicte sub Sigillis quondam Andree Andirsone et thome fyf tunc balliuj
Et quod dictus Arthurus est legittimis et propinquior heres dicte quondam Agnetis matris
sue de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis
valet nunc per Annuum quatuor marcas Et valuit xl s' tempore pacis Et quod
tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro per seruicium burgagium Et nunc
existit in manibus domini nostri Regis per spacium decim annorum aut eocirca ob
decessum dicte quondam agnetis matris sue In defectu virj heredis Jus suum huiusque
minime prosequentis datis et clausis sub Sigillo dicti thome Waus balliui et
Sigillis quorundum quj hinc Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum anno die mensis
et loco prenotatis

The saide day Johne of Cullane Alexander Rede gilbert menyeis James colison
Alexander gray and Dauy mar' was chosin and Suorne the gret aithez at command'
of the balyeis to se consider vndirstande and furthtgyff with thre wirkmen'
with thame the skathis done to William Wormetis hous' be William
blinsele coupar eftir the tenor of our' Souerane lordis lettres direct' to
thame tharapon' Ande the said' William and William oblist thame be the
fathtis of thar' bodiis to stand' and abid' at the said' deliuerance

The saide day Johne of mar' oblist him be the fatht of his bodie
to warande keipe and defende the personis that passit one the Inquest
of Arthour' andirsone Sone tile vmquhil Anny mar' skathtles
and fre of ale dampnage that may happin to Cum one tham for the
seruing of the saide breiwe Ande to be procurator for tham and defend' tham
one his avne expensis gif euere It happinis thame to be sum
mond'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxix die
mensis octobris anno quo supra

The saide day the wif of Jonhne flessour the wif of nichol bevmond'
and ellene gravnt was conuict be thar avne tounge gravnt for selling'
of viij d' aile that was Set be the Cunnaris for vj d' for the quhilkis
Ilkan of thame was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and to amend as law
wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The saide day the ballieis assignit Johne Kennertj to cum one monunday
that next cumis befor thame and mak fatht he is nocht aving vij pekis Salt
to Katherine Cullane and falyeing tharof to pay the saide Salt

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis ordanit gilbert prestone to ger' clois'
the draucht one the baklande quhar he duellis that george bissat duellis
be skathtles thar' in tyme to Cum and vys' it nocht be him nor nayn vthiris

Eodem die Andreas Jonhnesone piscator conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
Johannis Waus prelocutoris eiusdem pro iniusta expulsione Willelmum gordone de
In qua conductus fuit et cetera Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Infra ordinarunt
eundem Willelmum ad remenendum in dicta ad laborem suum Et ad huiusmodi sufficiens
res conueniens pro suo labore et Sufficiens repertus fuit Remanere in burgo

The saide day Johne of balcrome lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit
to Ansuer' to patry andirsone for the wranguis' haldin fra him of vj s' and
vj d' of maile tharfor the ballieis ordanit gilbert prestone officiar' to pas
and tak ane streis' of the saide Johnez and lat it agan to the borghe' and It be
askit and warne him to comper on' monunday that nixt cumis to ansuer'
for the wranguis' haldin of the saide maile as ferd' day of process'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die
mensis Octobris anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene vltimo die mensis octobris anno Domin Millesimo
quingentesimo quinto Coram honorabilibus virum Johanne leslie de Warderis preposito / thoma leslie
thoma Waus et patricio leslie tribus balliuorum dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem
protribunali sedens per subscriptum videlicet Johannem mar' matheum branche Johannem
Dauid fynne Adam Weir' Willelmum Rollande Johanem chepman Jacobum Kennertj
Johannem murray malcomum crag Willelmum portar gilbertum litster et Johannem andir
sone burgensis dicti burgi / Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam gilbertus riburne auunculus
Dauid broys' latoris presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus et de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dicti burgi in vico nauium ex orientali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis chamer ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Andree lammynton'
ex boreali partibus ab altera et terram quondam Jacobi Kyntor ex orientali et communionem viam regiam ex
occidentali Et quod dictus Dauid est vnus de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam gilberti auunculi
suj Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod valet nunc per annum quadraginta denarios
et valuit vigintj denarios tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in Capite de Suppremo
domino nostro Regfe per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri ob decessum
dicti quondam gilberti auunucli suj per spacium duorum mensum aut eocirca in defectu virj
heredi Jus suum huiusmodi minime prosequentis datis et clausis sub Sigillo
balliui et sigillis quorundam quj huic Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum anno
die mense et loco prenotatis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Octauo die
mensis Nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day the ballieis assignit friday the xv day of this Instant
monetht of Nouember' to gilbert menyeis one that ane part / mathow
branche and Dauid mar' one that vthir to Comper befor tham for ministra
cioun' of Justice on the actioun' contenit in our Souerane lordis lettres
directit to tham Anent the Some of xxvj li' xvj schillingis viij d'
with Intimacioun that quethir thai Comperit or nocht thar walde procede
and minister Justice eftir the tenour of the said' our Souerane lordis lettres

The saide day the ballieis continevit the actioun' of clame of airschip persevit
be thomas chavmyr' agane margaret Kintor the Relict of vmquhile William
chamer quhile friday the xv day of this Instant monetht of nouembir

The saide day Alexander goldsmitht grantit to releiwe Duncan mar' of vij s' at
the handis of Niniane blinsele

The said' day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne mar' forspekar that
Sandy goldsmitht sal pay to Ninian' blinsele vij s' and quhat werklummys
that he coud' preiwe the said' Ninian' takin avay of his suld' be Restorit
agan

The saide day thomas bisset lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit to
ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be William blinsel for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of iiijor franche crovnis et cetera tharfor the balyeis ordanit thomas leslie to
entir the said' thomas befor thame one the vigile of Sanct Androw to ansuer
to the saide borghe' becaus' he tuk nay Souerte of him to entir the saide
day

The saide' day meg hay spous' to William Smitht was conuict be ane suorne
assis' Johne mar' forespekar for strubulance of ormond' leslie officiar' in the
execucioun' of his office for the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera
and he quyt of strubulance of the said' margaret for the quhilkis It was deliuerit
be the saide assis' that gif euere scho strubulis ony officiar' in tym' to cum and
beis conuict tharof sal pay x s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin and j li'
wax to the haly blud' licht

The said' day Donalde baxtar was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Johne mar'
forspekar for Refusing of the kingis money et cetera for the quhilkis he was in
ane amerciament of the Court Ande atour it was ordanit be the assis' gif euere
he or ony vthiris refus' the kingis money in tym cumin and beis conuict
tharof Sal stand' in the goif xxiiij houris and thir cragis in the gof at wil of the
balyeis
ande atour the said' Dondald' was conuict for strubulance of gilbert prestone
officiar for the quhilk he was in ane Amerciament of the court and to amend'
as law wile and forber' in tym' to Cum

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauy blinsele
forspekar that William verty sal pay to Elspat bogy tene Schillingis
Scottis money betuix this and Sanct Nicholes day nixt to Cum quethir
he sele hir clatht or nocht

The saide day the wif of Johne blak wattirmane the wif of Wille skogis
the wif of Richerd redhede the wif of Johne balgreschow and the wif
of Johne frostar conuict' be thar' avne toungis grant' for brekin of common
ordinance in selling of ale derrar thane It was Set be the Cunnaris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis
Nouembris anno quo supra

The said' day Androw balcrome and Robert gothtray deponit that Jhone Redis cow
hed skathtit Johne Waus' cow iij s'

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais tile Alexander brabner to ansuer
to the borghe fundin one him for the distrucioun' of the lesting of the hous' Set
to him' pertening to george bisset and Katherine prat his Spous'

The said' day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais tile James crukschank
to ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Alexander brabner that he aw to relewe
him of the skatht done to the lesting of the hous' Set to him be george bisset

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that nixt cumis tile Johne nidre tile
ansuer to the borghe fundin one him that he aw to ger' deliuer him ane pece of Rynsche
wyn' put in William Scottis schip quhar he was clerk et cetera a ellis fynd him ane
dettour to be thomas Waus

The saide day thomas chamer with george bissat his forspekar fande ane borghe in
the handis of ormond' leslie officiar' that margaret Kintor the Relict of vmquhile of
chamer wranguislie and agan the law the held' fra him the gudis movable' of arschip
pertening to him be deces' of vmquhile chamer his Eme quhilkis the said margaret be
hir and Johne of mar' hir forspekar denyit Offering hir to vndirlie the decision'
of ane Suorne assis' vnsuspect And' in continent with consent of batht the saide
partiis the saide borghe' was put to the determinacioun' of thir personis Robert blinsele
Dauy menyeis Johne Cullan Alexander Rede Johne Wormet Androw Cullan James Colison
Androw murray / Dauy mar' eldar Richerde Waus eldar William blinsele William Kintor
and Robert hay quhilkis suorne in ane assis' riplie auisit the richtis resonis and
allegacionis of batht the saide partiis herde seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit and
fand' be the moutht of the saide Alexander Rede forspekar of the saide assis' the saide
borghe' of nayn' avale for the quhilkis the saide thomas chamer was in ane
amerciament of the Court and the said' margaret quyt of his challance of the saide gudis
of airschipe

The saide day the borghe' fundin one thomas bisset mar' of fe be William
blinsel for the wranguis' haldin fra him of four' franche crovnis was
fundin avale be ane Suorne assis' Alexander rede forspekar for the quhilkis
the saide thomas was in ane Amerciament of the Court and aw to pay the saide four'
franche crovnis to the saide William Ande patry leslie come Souerte for the
pament of the saide iiijor franche within terme of law / Ande thomas bisset
oblist him be his handis landis and gudis to freithe the saide patry of the
Saide money / and gif he pais the saide iiijor franche crovnis the saide
thomas sale allow it in the saide patrikis maile eftir the tenor of the contrak
maid' betuix thame Obefor

The saide day gilbert menyeis grantit him caciounar for Alexander chamer his
fadir in the law for the gudis of airschip pertening to thomas chamer
ayr' tile vmquhile William of chamer throw the deces' of the saide William
And the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to the saide gilbert to
ansuer' to the said' thomas for the saide airschipe According to Justice

The said day comperit gilbert menyeis at day assingit to him and askit the
ballieis thar decret and deliuerance in the actioun' contenit in our Soueran lordis lettres
anent the Releving of him of xxvj li' and xvj s' for certane Salt et cetera Ande allegit
that mathou branche Sone and ayr' to vmquhile Androw branche and Dauy mar' sone
and ayr to vmqhile thomas mar' awe to releiwe of him of the saide Somez
quhilkis the saide Mathou and Dauy opinlie denyit Ande in continent thareftir
with consent and assent of batht the said partiis chesit thir personis vndir writin
Robert blinsel Johne cullane Alexander Rede Johne Wormet Androw Cullan James
Colison' Johne mar' Androw murray Dauy mar' eldar patry Rede William blinsele
Richerd Waus William Kintor Alexander burnat and Robert hay burges of the saide burghe
and causit tham be Suorne and be assessoris to thame and gif tham leill and trew consale
in the said' matir quhilkis ripie auisit fande the deposicionis of sere Jhone ruthir
furde knycht vmquhile Androw Cullane and Johne Colisone availe quhilkis hed deponit
that the saide gilbert as factour to george eduardsone Sellit certan Salt tharfor
the balyeis riplie auisit the richtis resonnis and allegaciounis of batht the said' partiis
herde seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit and decretit that the saidez mathow branche
and Dauy mar' as ayris to thar said' fadris awe to releiwe and freitht the saide
gilbert menyes of the saide xxvj li' and xvj s' at the handis of george eduardsone et cetera
